description:
I started this 12 Jul 2018 06∶17∶44 PM EDT, and 22 hours later it's still working on writing an ISO to USB.

Currently two stars because the submit review button greys out when set to one.
summary: Might work, not waiting to find out

description:
Booted a fresh install of opensuse, did a full upgrade, installed this, plugged in a Sandisk 3.0 USB which Image Burner auto detected, selected the current Linux Mint XFCE iso, it was about 1.8G pressed start and it took no longer than 2 minutes to complete. 
The USB created with this application works as if I had made it with any other method which works. I feel sorry for the guy who waited 22 hours... 5 starts from me, all this is a progress bar to confirm its actually copying.
Simple to use, doesn't over-complicate things.
Very simple and straight forward. Love that it automatically generates a checksum for you
A few clicks and i had a bootable usb flashdisk
Wärend ubootin und yumi bei mir immer mal wieder isos nicht funktionierend auf die sd card schafften, klappt es mit image burner immer, egal wie unbekannt die distro!
summary: Besser als alle anderen, auch hochgelobten!

description:
Egal ob opensuse, FreeBSD oder Ubuntu – bislang hat das Tool bei mir jedes OS zuverlässig im ersten Anlauf auf einen USB-Stick geschrieben. Dazu ist es 
- schlank
- schnell
- gut und einfach designed

.iso auswählen, USB-Stick auswählen, starten… das war’s. Ich kenne schlicht keinen besseren Boot-Stick Writer.

+ очень просто и удобно.
+ проверка хеш сумм
